nodes.bodyText: this is basically tech.pegasys.teku.beaconrestapi.handlers.v1.events.EventType - should we use the same?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@

+package tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote;
+
+public class EventTypes {
+  public static final String HEAD = "head";
+  public static final String CHAIN_REORG = "chain_reorg";
+}

nodes.bodyText: It wasn't in an accessible module before (was in with all the implementation of the REST API).  I've moved it to be with the other API response schema stuff and now use it.
nodes.diffHunk:
